graphs.query: event.category='file' NOT(src.process.user in ('NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM','NT AUTHORITY\\NETWORK SERVICE','NT AUTHORITY\\LOCAL SERVICE','SYSTEM')) | columns endpoint.name, event.type, src.process.displayName, tgt.file.path, tgt.file.type, tgt.file.sha256
graphs.title: EDR File Activity

graphs.query: event.category='process' NOT(src.process.user in ('NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM','NT AUTHORITY\\NETWORK SERVICE','NT AUTHORITY\\LOCAL SERVICE','SYSTEM')) | group count = count() by endpoint.name, tgt.process.displayName | sort - count | limit 10
graphs.title: Process Activity by Endpoint

graphs.query: EventID=4624 | group c=count() by Account_Name, Computer | sort -c | limit 10
graphs.title: Remote Logins

graphs.query: event.urlcategory=* | group count() by event.urlcategory | sort -count | limit 10
graphs.title: Top URL Categories

graphs.query: event.category='ip' event.network.direction='OUTGOING' NOT(src.process.user in ('NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM','NT AUTHORITY\\NETWORK SERVICE','NT AUTHORITY\\LOCAL SERVICE','SYSTEM')) | group count() by src.process.displayName, dst.port.number | sort -count | limit 10
graphs.title: Outbound Port Usage
